javadoc:
Service provided by the program tree plugin to get the current view 
 (address set shown in the Code Browser), 
 and the name of the tree currently being viewed.

methods.javadoc: Get the name of the tree currently being viewed.
methods.name: getViewedTreeName
methods.comment: Get the name of the tree currently being viewed.

methods.name: setViewedTree
methods.comment:
Set the current view to that of the given name. If treeName is not
 a known view, then nothing happens.

methods.javadoc:
Get the address set of the current view (what is currently being shown in
 the Code Browser).
methods.name: getView
methods.comment:
Get the address set of the current view (what is currently being shown in
 the Code Browser).

methods.javadoc:
Set the selection to the given group paths.
@param gps paths to select
methods.name: setGroupSelection
methods.comment: Set the selection to the given group paths.

name: ProgramTreeService
comment:
Service provided by the program tree plugin to get the current view 
 (address set shown in the Code Browser), 
 and the name of the tree currently being viewed.
